content: The Rat Imperial Guard is accessible after defeating the Tiger Vanguard at Crouching Tiger Temple. After winning that fight, head out the back of Crouching Tiger Temple and work your way through the town that the path winds through. The Rat Imperial Guard is perched on a roof at the end of the town.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Imperial_Guard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Imperial Guard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Rat Imperial Guard Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Imperial Guard is accessible after defeating the Tiger Vanguard at Crouching Tiger Temple. After winning that fight, head out the back of Crouching Tiger Temple and work your way through the town that the path winds through. The Rat Imperial Guard is perched on a roof at the end of the town.
